description: This file defines an in-memory, thread-safe repository for notes, implementing CRUD operations and suitable for development and testing purposes.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory repository implementing INoteRepository for managing notes.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Adds a new note to the repository.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes, ordered by creation date descending.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the repository.
